sections.heading: 01|Effect of sections - liberal interpretation
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFSections3935.01to3935.17, inclusive, of the Revised Code do not prohibit or discourage reasonable competition, or prohibit or encourage unifor

sections.heading: 17, inclusive, of the Revised Code do not prohibit or discourage reasonable competition, or prohibit or encourage uniformity in insurance rates, rating systems, rating plans, or practices
sections.text: Such sections shall be liberally interpreted to carry this section into effect.

sections.heading: 13, inclusive, of the Revised Code are applicable to the rule-making functions of the superintendent under sections3935
sections.text: 01to3935.17, inclusive, of the Revised Code, including appeals from the order of the superintendent in adopting, amending, or rescinding rules.

sections.heading: the Revised Code is not repealed or affected by sections3935
sections.text: 01to3935.17, inclusive, of the Revised Code, but compliance with sections3935.01to3935.17, inclusive, of the Revised Code, shall not be deemed to be a violation of section3927.05of the Revised Code.
